## Question 

1. Find a time series and convert the series into a tabular series with 6 lags . Implement at least 5 machine learning models on the tabular series. Plot the forecast series and the original series. Report the MAPE of the models. 

2. Increase the number of lags and redo the avove. Does increasing the number of lags improve the models' performance?
